subject_terms_3: Portrait photography Corporations Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a large group of people. They make up four rows, with the first row comprising of seated personnel. Almost everyone is in formal attire, with a suit and a tie. The background of the photograph shows the entrances of a large building. There are inscriptions on the brown border between the photograph and the frame,  Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows the board of directors of the Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation in 1936.
title_text: Board of directors of the Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation
